tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    authors VARCHAR(255),
    abstract TEXT,
    publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE peer_reviewed_articles (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  authors VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  published_date DATE,
  doi VARCHAR(50),
  abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_collaborations (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  funding_source VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  collaborators VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
  article_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT NOT NULL,
  authors TEXT[],
  abstract TEXT,
  publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE authors (
  author_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  affiliation TEXT,
  email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
  collaboration_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id INT REFERENCES articles (article_id),
  author_id INT REFERENCES authors (author_id),
  collaboration_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE articles (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  authors TEXT[],
  publication_date DATE,
  abstract TEXT,
  keywords TEXT[]
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id INT,
  author_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    publish_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT,
    keywords VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE authors (
    author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    affiliation VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT,
    author_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    comments TEXT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id)
);
